entry.title: Russia Pummels Ukrainian Civilian Targets Ahead of Talks
entry.content: Continuing their encirclement operations on Ukrainian cities, Russian forces prevented civilians from escaping via humanitarian corridors and shelled urban centers in the country’s north and south.

entry.title: How War in Ukraine Drives Up Inflation at U.S. Farms, Supermarkets, Retailers
entry.content: The global supply chain is slow, but the economic fallout from the invasion of Ukraine is swiftly raising prices for producers and consumers world-wide. “It seems to be overshadowing everything now.”
